website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Showdown 4 is best for neutral runners looking for a barefoot feel when running. A track and field shoe intended for optimal performance, the Showdown 4 gives runners speed and comfort at a reasonable cost. Achieving such a feat has been through the coordination of the lightweight and aggressive technical features of the shoe.
pros: Many of the runners claim that the Saucony Showdown 4 has improved their speed
A lot of athletes appreciate the rigidity of the shoe
It has a great fit, according to several users
Some reviewers claim that it is very comfortable
The stability provided by the shoe is lauded by quite a few people
cons: Several are disappointed with the shoe’s massive weight
Some customers state that the shoe easily wore out

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My son is a 10th grader who runs multiple events. He usually will not use his spikes immediately in a trackmeet. He likes to break them in at practice. When he tried these on, he said they were so comfortable and the fit was perfect... he wore them on Saturday. The picture does not do justice to the shoe. The shoe is a bright yellow (its helps me to videotape him) and the bottom is a metallic gold. Good shoe so far, now I need to see how long it will last. My son goes through a few pair of track spikes per season.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Gee

customer_reviews.title: ... it is a very stylish and sleek shoe and great for sprinting
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfy and fit as expected the only downfall was they a little bit thick in the counter part of the shoe but doesn't bother me during events overall it is a very stylish and sleek shoe and great for sprinting.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are actually more comfortable than my tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are actually more comfortable than my tennis shoes. Extremely nice shoes, definitely worth the investment. The shoes are extremely flexible on top, a considerable advantage for anyone with an abnormal foot shape, like myself. Would buy again if I was good enough to do track in college.

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice spike. Materials are light but very high quality. Fit is nice and tight. The ISO Fit really helps with getting the spike to wrap around your foot comfortably. Grip is excellent, as you'd expect for a 10 spike, full plate. My school unfortunately runs on a dirt/sand track so these have already seen wear on the pike plate after only two 100m dashes during practice, so I will definitly be using these exclusively for meets. Other than that, which is expected, they are pretty light considering they cary 10 spikes each, and feel even lighter when you're sprinting down the track. Definitly recommend these to any sprinters looking for a high quality sprint, full plate spike.
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo

product_meta.title: Saucony mens SHOWDOWN 4-M Showdown 4
product_meta.description: Why slow down when you can Showdown? The premium fourth edition to this elite sprint spike features FLEXFILM overlays and an ISOFIT lacing system that helps keep you securely fastened to the full-length 10-Pin Pebax spike plate.
feature_bullets: Isofit, flex film, 10 pin pebax spike plate
